note:
I am a mess but strive to be a friendly one. Can be a tad sarcastic/snarky when I'm low on spoons, but I still mean well, when in doubt, don't take me too serious. I'm always open to talk about the way I communicate. Also I'm dyslexic so expect a frick ton of spelling mistakes.

In general you're free to boost whatever you can. Flirts okay, but I probably won't realize you're doing it.

Available in 🇳🇱, 🇬🇧, and some 🇪🇸 (I'd love to practice)

queer 🏳️‍🌈, neurospicy✨ tired 💀
